thumb.title: About the pain of men and the caution of God（男の痛みと神様の警戒について）
thumb.description: 原作：About the pain of men and the caution of God（男の痛みと神様の警戒について）ＦＣ２ブログ「古典太平記」よりThis video explains groin kicks and boys' sensitive spots.A female character talks about boys' weak points.It teaches why boys immediately collapse when kicked in the groin.Watch this video to understand why the testicles are a vulnerable spot.CV：神在ほたる
